# Station Engineer SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#c8a404][bold]Station Engineer[/bold][/color] and [color=#c8a404][bold]Technical Assistant[/bold][/color] of this station.
1. Engineers are responsible for the proper activation and maintenance of the station's engines, alongside maintaining the Stations Power Network. Failure to do so is grounds for termination.
2. Engineers are not permitted to construct additional engines (such as additional SM/Tesla/Singularity engines, and/or solar panels) until at least one engine is correctly set up and powering the station.
3. Engineers must check each active engine at least once per 30 minutes to ensure safety and fueling.
4. Engineers are permitted to carry out solo reconstruction/rebuilding/personal projects if there is no damage to the station that requires fixing. Large projects require approval from Captain and/or Chief Engineer. Resources must be accounted for and not deprived from other Departments.
5. Engineers must promptly respond to breaches within fifteen (15) minutes, and may hack doors to gain access should the location need repairs. All hazard zones must be cordoned off with Holofans or barriers.
6. Engineers are required to respond to any emergency requested by Security/Command for perma brig, bridge, brig, etc. immediately.
